DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether co-administration rifampin neratinib effect pharmacokinetics ( body absorbs , distributes , metabolize and/or excretes ) neratinib .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Potential Effect Of Rifampin On The Pharmacokinetics Of Neratinib
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy men woman ( non childbearing potential ) Ages 18 50 year old .
